High Priest Raymond:
Go to the Gorgon Flower Garden and explore it carefully. I'm sure you'll find there someting suspicious. Also kill Harpies, Medusas, Turak Bugbears, Turak Bugbear Warriors and Amber Basilisks.

The easiest way to reach the Gorgon Flower Garden is a teleport that can be found on the teleport page of Giran.

The mission is very dangerous but I've heard about your power, so I've no doubt that you will do what should be done. May Einhasad bless you.
